fr.laposte.api

Class LpSdk.ApiClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.laposte.api.LpSdk.ApiClient
  • Enclosing class:
    LpSdk

    public static class LpSdk.ApiClient
extends Object
    REST client helper to use with La Poste Open APIs.
